text: læa thæcring nı hmu phu di rab khamphir nan mi phu thi sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa sing thi thuk prathan lng ma kæ phwk cea læa tx sing thi thuk prathan lng ma kæ phwk khea nı thana phu nxb nxm tx xallxhˌ doythi phwk khea ca mi lækpeliyn xongkar khx ngxallxhˌ kab rakha xan leknxy chn hela ni hæla phwk khea ca di rab rangwal khxng phwk khea n phraphupenceakhxng phwk khea thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng rwdrew nı kar chara sxbswn
